name: Slide Demo
description:
Join the Discord here :  https://discord.gg/ZbbshkR

Prototype 9

You can read the patch note there : https://docs.google.com/document/d/115H-yYyyQHSidrI7B5BksZzVkwv6LNeRytmz3KWINEk/...

Includes :

  • Walk, Slide & Death terrain
  • Terrain Height, Gravity & 'Jumps'
  • Basic multipoint patrols & spawners
  • Editor to Paint Terrain, change Terrain's Height, place Patrols & create levels.
  • Configurable Tiles & Monster Types
  • Map Saving & Loading system
  • Camera control
  • Minimap
  • Simple Demo Maps
